502 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_TYPE_TRAITS
504 template <bool B, typename T, typename F>
505 struct conditional : std::conditional<B, T, F> {};
506 
508 template <bool B> struct bool_type : std::integral_constant<bool, B> {};
509 using std::false_type;
510 using std::true_type;
511 
513 template <typename T> struct is_float : std::is_floating_point<T> {};
514 #else
516 template <bool, typename T, typename> struct conditional { typedef T type; };
517 template <typename T, typename F> struct conditional<false, T, F> {
518  typedef F type;
519 };
520 
522 template <bool> struct bool_type {};
523 typedef bool_type<true> true_type;
524 typedef bool_type<false> false_type;
525 
527 template <typename> struct is_float : false_type {};
528 template <typename T> struct is_float<const T> : is_float<T> {};
529 template <typename T> struct is_float<volatile T> : is_float<T> {};
530 template <typename T> struct is_float<const volatile T> : is_float<T> {};
531 template <> struct is_float<float> : true_type {};
532 template <> struct is_float<double> : true_type {};
533 template <> struct is_float<long double> : true_type {};
534 #endif
535 
537 template <typename T> struct bits { typedef unsigned char type; };
538 template <typename T> struct bits<const T> : bits<T> {};
539 template <typename T> struct bits<volatile T> : bits<T> {};
540 template <typename T> struct bits<const volatile T> : bits<T> {};

604 template <typename T> bool builtin_isinf(T arg) {
605 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
606  return std::isinf(arg);
607 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
608  return !::_finite(static_cast<double>(arg)) &&
609  !::_isnan(static_cast<double>(arg));
610 #else
611  return arg == std::numeric_limits<T>::infinity() ||
612  arg == -std::numeric_limits<T>::infinity();
613 #endif
614 }
615 
621 template <typename T> bool builtin_isnan(T arg) {
622 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
623  return std::isnan(arg);
624 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
625  return ::_isnan(static_cast<double>(arg)) != 0;
626 #else
627  return arg != arg;
628 #endif
629 }
630 
636 template <typename T> bool builtin_signbit(T arg) {
637 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
638  return std::signbit(arg);
639 #else
640  return arg < T() || (arg == T() && T(1) / arg < T());
641 #endif
642 }
643 
648 inline uint32 sign_mask(uint32 arg) {
649  static const int N = std::numeric_limits<uint32>::digits - 1;
650 #if HALF_TWOS_COMPLEMENT_INT
651  return static_cast<int32>(arg) >> N;
652 #else
653  return -((arg >> N) & 1);
654 #endif
655 }
656 
661 inline uint32 arithmetic_shift(uint32 arg, int i) {
662 #if HALF_TWOS_COMPLEMENT_INT
663  return static_cast<int32>(arg) >> i;
664 #else
665  return static_cast<int32>(arg) / (static_cast<int32>(1) << i) -
666  ((arg >> (std::numeric_limits<uint32>::digits - 1)) & 1);
667 #endif
668 }

676 inline int &errflags() {
677  HALF_THREAD_LOCAL int flags = 0;
678  return flags;
679 }
680 
684 inline void raise(int HALF_UNUSED_NOERR(flags),
685  bool HALF_UNUSED_NOERR(cond) = true) {
686 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
687  if (!cond)
688  return;
689 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING_FLAGS
690  errflags() |= flags;
691 #endif
692 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING_ERRNO
693  if (flags & FE_INVALID)
694  errno = EDOM;
695  else if (flags & (FE_DIVBYZERO | FE_OVERFLOW | FE_UNDERFLOW))
696  errno = ERANGE;
697 #endif
698 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING_FENV && HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CFENV
699  std::feraiseexcept(flags);
700 #endif
701 #ifdef HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_INVALID
702  if (flags & FE_INVALID)
703  throw std::domain_error(HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_INVALID);
704 #endif
705 #ifdef HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_DIVBYZERO
706  if (flags & FE_DIVBYZERO)
707  throw std::domain_error(HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_DIVBYZERO);
708 #endif
709 #ifdef HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_OVERFLOW
710  if (flags & FE_OVERFLOW)
711  throw std::overflow_error(HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_OVERFLOW);
712 #endif
713 #ifdef HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_UNDERFLOW
714  if (flags & FE_UNDERFLOW)
715  throw std::underflow_error(HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_UNDERFLOW);
716 #endif
717 #ifdef HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_INEXACT
718  if (flags & FE_INEXACT)
719  throw std::range_error(HALF_ERRHANDLING_THROW_INEXACT);
720 #endif
721 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING_UNDERFLOW_TO_INEXACT
722  if ((flags & FE_UNDERFLOW) && !(flags & FE_INEXACT))
723  raise(FE_INEXACT);
724 #endif
725 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING_OVERFLOW_TO_INEXACT
726  if ((flags & FE_OVERFLOW) && !(flags & FE_INEXACT))
727  raise(FE_INEXACT);
728 #endif
729 #endif
730 }
731 
738 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR bool compsignal(unsigned int x, unsigned int y) {
739 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
740  raise(FE_INVALID, (x & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00 || (y & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00);
741 #endif
742  return (x & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00 || (y & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00;
743 }
744 
749 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int signal(unsigned int nan) {
750 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
751  raise(FE_INVALID, !(nan & 0x200));
752 #endif
753  return nan | 0x200;
754 }
755 
761 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int signal(unsigned int x,
762  unsigned int y) {
763 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
764  raise(FE_INVALID, ((x & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00 && !(x & 0x200)) ||
765  ((y & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00 && !(y & 0x200)));
766 #endif
767  return ((x & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00) ? (x | 0x200) : (y | 0x200);
768 }
769 
776 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int signal(unsigned int x, unsigned int y,
777  unsigned int z) {
778 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
779  raise(FE_INVALID, ((x & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00 && !(x & 0x200)) ||
780  ((y & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00 && !(y & 0x200)) ||
781  ((z & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00 && !(z & 0x200)));
782 #endif
783  return ((x & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00) ? (x | 0x200)
784  : ((y & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00) ? (y | 0x200)
785  : (z | 0x200);
786 }
787 
793 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int
794 select(unsigned int x, unsigned int HALF_UNUSED_NOERR(y)) {
795 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
796  return (((y & 0x7FFF) > 0x7C00) && !(y & 0x200)) ? signal(y) : x;
797 #else
798  return x;
799 #endif
800 }

805 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int invalid() {
806 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
807  raise(FE_INVALID);
808 #endif
809  return 0x7FFF;
810 }

816 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int pole(unsigned int sign = 0) {
817 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
818  raise(FE_DIVBYZERO);
819 #endif
820  return sign | 0x7C00;
821 }

827 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int check_underflow(unsigned int arg) {
828 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING && !HALF_ERRHANDLING_UNDERFLOW_TO_INEXACT
829  raise(FE_UNDERFLOW, !(arg & 0x7C00));
830 #endif
831  return arg;
832 }
833 
837 
843 template <std::float_round_style R>
844 HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int overflow(unsigned int sign = 0) {
845 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
846  raise(FE_OVERFLOW);
847 #endif
848  return (R == std::round_toward_infinity) ? (sign + 0x7C00 - (sign >> 15))
849  : (R == std::round_toward_neg_infinity)
850  ? (sign + 0x7BFF + (sign >> 15))
851  : (R == std::round_toward_zero) ? (sign | 0x7BFF)
852  : (sign | 0x7C00);
853 }
854 
860 template <std::float_round_style R>
861 HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int underflow(unsigned int sign = 0) {
862 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
863  raise(FE_UNDERFLOW);
864 #endif
865  return (R == std::round_toward_infinity) ? (sign + 1 - (sign >> 15))
866  : (R == std::round_toward_neg_infinity) ? (sign + (sign >> 15))
867  : sign;
868 }
869 
880 template <std::float_round_style R, bool I>
881 HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR unsigned int rounded(unsigned int value, int g, int s) {
882 #if HALF_ERRHANDLING
883  value += (R == std::round_to_nearest) ? (g & (s | value))
884  : (R == std::round_toward_infinity) ? (~(value >> 15) & (g | s))
885  : (R == std::round_toward_neg_infinity) ? ((value >> 15) & (g | s))
886  : 0;
887  if ((value & 0x7C00) == 0x7C00)
888  raise(FE_OVERFLOW);
889  else if (value & 0x7C00)
890  raise(FE_INEXACT, I || (g | s) != 0);
891  else
892  raise(FE_UNDERFLOW,
893  !(HALF_ERRHANDLING_UNDERFLOW_TO_INEXACT) || I || (g | s) != 0);
894  return value;
895 #else
896  return (R == std::round_to_nearest) ? (value + (g & (s | value)))
897  : (R == std::round_toward_infinity)
898  ? (value + (~(value >> 15) & (g | s)))
899  : (R == std::round_toward_neg_infinity)
900  ? (value + ((value >> 15) & (g | s)))
901  : value;
902 #endif
903 }
904 
912 template <std::float_round_style R, bool E, bool I>
913 unsigned int integral(unsigned int value) {
914  unsigned int abs = value & 0x7FFF;
915  if (abs < 0x3C00) {
916  raise(FE_INEXACT, I);
917  return ((R == std::round_to_nearest)
918  ? (0x3C00 & -static_cast<unsigned>(abs >= (0x3800 + E)))
919  : (R == std::round_toward_infinity)
920  ? (0x3C00 & -(~(value >> 15) & (abs != 0)))
921  : (R == std::round_toward_neg_infinity)
922  ? (0x3C00 & -static_cast<unsigned>(value > 0x8000))
923  : 0) |
924  (value & 0x8000);
925  }
926  if (abs >= 0x6400)
927  return (abs > 0x7C00) ? signal(value) : value;
928  unsigned int exp = 25 - (abs >> 10), mask = (1 << exp) - 1;
929  raise(FE_INEXACT, I && (value & mask));
930  return (((R == std::round_to_nearest)
931  ? ((1 << (exp - 1)) - (~(value >> exp) & E))
932  : (R == std::round_toward_infinity) ? (mask & ((value >> 15) - 1))
933  : (R == std::round_toward_neg_infinity) ? (mask & -(value >> 15))
934  : 0) +
935  value) &
936  ~mask;
937 }
938 
951 template <std::float_round_style R, unsigned int F, bool S, bool N, bool I>
952 unsigned int fixed2half(uint32 m, int exp = 14, unsigned int sign = 0,
953  int s = 0) {
954  if (S) {
955  uint32 msign = sign_mask(m);
956  m = (m ^ msign) - msign;
957  sign = msign & 0x8000;
958  }
959  if (N)
960  for (; m < (static_cast<uint32>(1) << F) && exp; m <<= 1, --exp)
961  ;
962  else if (exp < 0)
963  return rounded<R, I>(
964  sign + (m >> (F - 10 - exp)), (m >> (F - 11 - exp)) & 1,
965  s | ((m & ((static_cast<uint32>(1) << (F - 11 - exp)) - 1)) != 0));
966  return rounded<R, I>(
967  sign + (exp << 10) + (m >> (F - 10)), (m >> (F - 11)) & 1,
968  s | ((m & ((static_cast<uint32>(1) << (F - 11)) - 1)) != 0));
969 }

1104 template <std::float_round_style R>
1105 unsigned int float2half_impl(double value, true_type) {
1106 #if HALF_ENABLE_F16C_INTRINSICS
1107  if (R == std::round_indeterminate)
1108  return _mm_cvtsi128_si32(_mm_cvtps_ph(_mm_cvtpd_ps(_mm_set_sd(value)),
1109  _MM_FROUND_CUR_DIRECTION));
1110 #endif
1111  bits<double>::type dbits;
1112  std::memcpy(&dbits, &value, sizeof(double));
1113  uint32 hi = dbits >> 32, lo = dbits & 0xFFFFFFFF;
1114  unsigned int sign = (hi >> 16) & 0x8000;
1115  hi &= 0x7FFFFFFF;
1116  if (hi >= 0x7FF00000)
1117  return sign | 0x7C00 |
1118  ((dbits & 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFF) ? (0x200 | ((hi >> 10) & 0x3FF)) : 0);
1119  if (hi >= 0x40F00000)
1120  return overflow<R>(sign);
1121  if (hi >= 0x3F100000)
1122  return rounded<R, false>(sign | (((hi >> 20) - 1008) << 10) |
1123  ((hi >> 10) & 0x3FF),
1124  (hi >> 9) & 1, ((hi & 0x1FF) | lo) != 0);
1125  if (hi >= 0x3E600000) {
1126  int i = 1018 - (hi >> 20);
1127  hi = (hi & 0xFFFFF) | 0x100000;
1128  return rounded<R, false>(
1129  sign | (hi >> (i + 1)), (hi >> i) & 1,
1130  ((hi & ((static_cast<uint32>(1) << i) - 1)) | lo) != 0);
1131  }
1132  if ((hi | lo) != 0)
1133  return underflow<R>(sign);
1134  return sign;
1135 }

1145 template <std::float_round_style R, typename T>
1146 unsigned int float2half_impl(T value, ...) {
1147  unsigned int hbits = static_cast<unsigned>(builtin_signbit(value)) << 15;
1148  if (value == T())
1149  return hbits;
1150  if (builtin_isnan(value))
1151  return hbits | 0x7FFF;
1152  if (builtin_isinf(value))
1153  return hbits | 0x7C00;
1154  int exp;
1155  std::frexp(value, &exp);
1156  if (exp > 16)
1157  return overflow<R>(hbits);
1158  if (exp < -13)
1159  value = std::ldexp(value, 25);
1160  else {
1161  value = std::ldexp(value, 12 - exp);
1162  hbits |= ((exp + 13) << 10);
1163  }
1164  T ival, frac = std::modf(value, &ival);
1165  int m = std::abs(static_cast<int>(ival));
1166  return rounded<R, false>(hbits + (m >> 1), m & 1, frac != T());
1167 }

1177 template <std::float_round_style R, typename T>
1178 unsigned int float2half(T value) {
1179  return float2half_impl<R>(
1180  value, bool_type < std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559 &&
1181  sizeof(typename bits<T>::type) == sizeof(T) > ());
1182 }

1191 template <std::float_round_style R, typename T> unsigned int int2half(T value) {
1192  unsigned int bits = static_cast<unsigned>(value < 0) << 15;
1193  if (!value)
1194  return bits;
1195  if (bits)
1196  value = -value;
1197  if (value > 0xFFFF)
1198  return overflow<R>(bits);
1199  unsigned int m = static_cast<unsigned int>(value), exp = 24;
1200  for (; m < 0x400; m <<= 1, --exp)
1201  ;
1202  for (; m > 0x7FF; m >>= 1, ++exp)
1203  ;
1204  bits |= (exp << 10) + m;
1205  return (exp > 24) ? rounded<R, false>(bits, (value >> (exp - 25)) & 1,
1206  (((1 << (exp - 25)) - 1) & value) != 0)
1207  : bits;
1208 }

1603 inline double half2float_impl(unsigned int value, double, true_type) {
1604 #if HALF_ENABLE_F16C_INTRINSICS
1605  return _mm_cvtsd_f64(_mm_cvtps_pd(_mm_cvtph_ps(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(value))));
1606 #else
1607  uint32 hi = static_cast<uint32>(value & 0x8000) << 16;
1608  unsigned int abs = value & 0x7FFF;
1609  if (abs) {
1610  hi |= 0x3F000000 << static_cast<unsigned>(abs >= 0x7C00);
1611  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, hi -= 0x100000)
1612  ;
1613  hi += static_cast<uint32>(abs) << 10;
1614  }
1615  bits<double>::type dbits = static_cast<bits<double>::type>(hi) << 32;
1616  double out;
1617  std::memcpy(&out, &dbits, sizeof(double));
1618  return out;
1619 #endif
1620 }
1621 
1626 template <typename T> T half2float_impl(unsigned int value, T, ...) {
1627  T out;
1628  unsigned int abs = value & 0x7FFF;
1629  if (abs > 0x7C00)
1630  out = (std::numeric_limits<T>::has_signaling_NaN && !(abs & 0x200))
1631  ? std::numeric_limits<T>::signaling_NaN()
1632  : std::numeric_limits<T>::has_quiet_NaN
1633  ? std::numeric_limits<T>::quiet_NaN()
1634  : T();
1635  else if (abs == 0x7C00)
1636  out = std::numeric_limits<T>::has_infinity
1637  ? std::numeric_limits<T>::infinity()
1638  : std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
1639  else if (abs > 0x3FF)
1640  out = std::ldexp(static_cast<T>((abs & 0x3FF) | 0x400), (abs >> 10) - 25);
1641  else
1642  out = std::ldexp(static_cast<T>(abs), -24);
1643  return (value & 0x8000) ? -out : out;
1644 }
1645 
1650 template <typename T> T half2float(unsigned int value) {
1651  return half2float_impl(value, T(),
1652  bool_type < std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559 &&
1653  sizeof(typename bits<T>::type) == sizeof(T) > ());
1654 }

1665 template <std::float_round_style R, bool E, bool I, typename T>
1666 T half2int(unsigned int value) {
1667  unsigned int abs = value & 0x7FFF;
1668  if (abs >= 0x7C00) {
1669  raise(FE_INVALID);
1670  return (value & 0x8000) ? std::numeric_limits<T>::min()
1671  : std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
1672  }
1673  if (abs < 0x3800) {
1674  raise(FE_INEXACT, I);
1675  return (R == std::round_toward_infinity) ? T(~(value >> 15) & (abs != 0))
1676  : (R == std::round_toward_neg_infinity) ? -T(value > 0x8000)
1677  : T();
1678  }
1679  int exp = 25 - (abs >> 10);
1680  unsigned int m = (value & 0x3FF) | 0x400;
1681  int32 i = static_cast<int32>(
1682  (exp <= 0) ? (m << -exp)
1683  : ((m + ((R == std::round_to_nearest)
1684  ? ((1 << (exp - 1)) - (~(m >> exp) & E))
1685  : (R == std::round_toward_infinity)
1686  ? (((1 << exp) - 1) & ((value >> 15) - 1))
1687  : (R == std::round_toward_neg_infinity)
1688  ? (((1 << exp) - 1) & -(value >> 15))
1689  : 0)) >>
1690  exp));
1691  if ((!std::numeric_limits<T>::is_signed && (value & 0x8000)) ||
1692  (std::numeric_limits<T>::digits < 16 &&
1693  ((value & 0x8000) ? (-i < std::numeric_limits<T>::min())
1694  : (i > std::numeric_limits<T>::max()))))
1695  raise(FE_INVALID);
1696  else if (I && exp > 0 && (m & ((1 << exp) - 1)))
1697  raise(FE_INEXACT);
1698  return static_cast<T>((value & 0x8000) ? -i : i);
1699 }
1700 
1704 
1710 template <std::float_round_style R> uint32 mulhi(uint32 x, uint32 y) {
1711  uint32 xy = (x >> 16) * (y & 0xFFFF), yx = (x & 0xFFFF) * (y >> 16),
1712  c = (xy & 0xFFFF) + (yx & 0xFFFF) +
1713  (((x & 0xFFFF) * (y & 0xFFFF)) >> 16);
1714  return (x >> 16) * (y >> 16) + (xy >> 16) + (yx >> 16) + (c >> 16) +
1715  ((R == std::round_to_nearest) ? ((c >> 15) & 1)
1716  : (R == std::round_toward_infinity) ? ((c & 0xFFFF) != 0)
1717  : 0);
1718 }
1719 
1724 inline uint32 multiply64(uint32 x, uint32 y) {
1725 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_LONG_LONG
1726  return static_cast<uint32>(
1727  (static_cast<unsigned long long>(x) * static_cast<unsigned long long>(y) +
1728  0x80000000) >>
1729  32);
1730 #else
1731  return mulhi<std::round_to_nearest>(x, y);
1732 #endif
1733 }

1740 inline uint32 divide64(uint32 x, uint32 y, int &s) {
1741 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_LONG_LONG
1742  unsigned long long xx = static_cast<unsigned long long>(x) << 32;
1743  return s = (xx % y != 0), static_cast<uint32>(xx / y);
1744 #else
1745  y >>= 1;
1746  uint32 rem = x, div = 0;
1747  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 32; ++i) {
1748  div <<= 1;
1749  if (rem >= y) {
1750  rem -= y;
1751  div |= 1;
1752  }
1753  rem <<= 1;
1754  }
1755  return s = rem > 1, div;
1756 #endif
1757 }

1766 template <bool Q, bool R>
1767 unsigned int mod(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, int *quo = NULL) {
1768  unsigned int q = 0;
1769  if (x > y) {
1770  int absx = x, absy = y, expx = 0, expy = 0;
1771  for (; absx < 0x400; absx <<= 1, --expx)
1772  ;
1773  for (; absy < 0x400; absy <<= 1, --expy)
1774  ;
1775  expx += absx >> 10;
1776  expy += absy >> 10;
1777  int mx = (absx & 0x3FF) | 0x400, my = (absy & 0x3FF) | 0x400;
1778  for (int d = expx - expy; d; --d) {
1779  if (!Q && mx == my)
1780  return 0;
1781  if (mx >= my) {
1782  mx -= my;
1783  q += Q;
1784  }
1785  mx <<= 1;
1786  q <<= static_cast<int>(Q);
1787  }
1788  if (!Q && mx == my)
1789  return 0;
1790  if (mx >= my) {
1791  mx -= my;
1792  ++q;
1793  }
1794  if (Q) {
1795  q &= (1 << (std::numeric_limits<int>::digits - 1)) - 1;
1796  if (!mx)
1797  return *quo = q, 0;
1798  }
1799  for (; mx < 0x400; mx <<= 1, --expy)
1800  ;
1801  x = (expy > 0) ? ((expy << 10) | (mx & 0x3FF)) : (mx >> (1 - expy));
1802  }
1803  if (R) {
1804  unsigned int a, b;
1805  if (y < 0x800) {
1806  a = (x < 0x400) ? (x << 1) : (x + 0x400);
1807  b = y;
1808  } else {
1809  a = x;
1810  b = y - 0x400;
1811  }
1812  if (a > b || (a == b && (q & 1))) {
1813  int exp = (y >> 10) + (y <= 0x3FF), d = exp - (x >> 10) - (x <= 0x3FF);
1814  int m = (((y & 0x3FF) | ((y > 0x3FF) << 10)) << 1) -
1815  (((x & 0x3FF) | ((x > 0x3FF) << 10)) << (1 - d));
1816  for (; m < 0x800 && exp > 1; m <<= 1, --exp)
1817  ;
1818  x = 0x8000 + ((exp - 1) << 10) + (m >> 1);
1819  q += Q;
1820  }
1821  }
1822  if (Q)
1823  *quo = q;
1824  return x;
1825 }

1832 template <unsigned int F> uint32 sqrt(uint32 &r, int &exp) {
1833  int i = exp & 1;
1834  r <<= i;
1835  exp = (exp - i) / 2;
1836  uint32 m = 0;
1837  for (uint32 bit = static_cast<uint32>(1) << F; bit; bit >>= 2) {
1838  if (r < m + bit)
1839  m >>= 1;
1840  else {
1841  r -= m + bit;
1842  m = (m >> 1) + bit;
1843  }
1844  }
1845  return m;
1846 }

1854  static const uint32 logs[] = {
1855  0x80000000, 0x4AE00D1D, 0x2934F098, 0x15C01A3A, 0x0B31FB7D, 0x05AEB4DD,
1856  0x02DCF2D1, 0x016FE50B, 0x00B84E23, 0x005C3E10, 0x002E24CA, 0x001713D6,

1858  0x00002E2B, 0x00001715, 0x00000B8B, 0x000005C5, 0x000002E3, 0x00000171,
1859  0x000000B9, 0x0000005C, 0x0000002E, 0x00000017, 0x0000000C, 0x00000006,
1860  0x00000003, 0x00000001};

1905 inline std::pair<uint32, uint32> sincos(uint32 mz, unsigned int n = 31) {
1906  static const uint32 angles[] = {
1907  0x3243F6A9, 0x1DAC6705, 0x0FADBAFD, 0x07F56EA7, 0x03FEAB77, 0x01FFD55C,
1908  0x00FFFAAB, 0x007FFF55, 0x003FFFEB, 0x001FFFFD, 0x00100000, 0x00080000,
1909  0x00040000, 0x00020000, 0x00010000, 0x00008000, 0x00004000, 0x00002000,
1910  0x00001000, 0x00000800, 0x00000400, 0x00000200, 0x00000100, 0x00000080,
1911  0x00000040, 0x00000020, 0x00000010, 0x00000008, 0x00000004, 0x00000002,
1912  0x00000001};
1913  uint32 mx = 0x26DD3B6A, my = 0;

1931 inline uint32 atan2(uint32 my, uint32 mx, unsigned int n = 31) {
1932  static const uint32 angles[] = {
1933  0x3243F6A9, 0x1DAC6705, 0x0FADBAFD, 0x07F56EA7, 0x03FEAB77, 0x01FFD55C,

1955 inline uint32 angle_arg(unsigned int abs, int &k) {
1956  uint32 m = (abs & 0x3FF) | ((abs > 0x3FF) << 10);
1957  int exp = (abs >> 10) + (abs <= 0x3FF) - 15;
1958  if (abs < 0x3A48)
1959  return k = 0, m << (exp + 20);
1960 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_LONG_LONG
1961  unsigned long long y = m * 0xA2F9836E4E442, mask = (1ULL << (62 - exp)) - 1,
1962  yi = (y + (mask >> 1)) & ~mask, f = y - yi;
1963  uint32 sign = -static_cast<uint32>(f >> 63);
1964  k = static_cast<int>(yi >> (62 - exp));
1965  return (multiply64(static_cast<uint32>((sign ? -f : f) >> (31 - exp)),
1966  0xC90FDAA2) ^
1967  sign) -
1968  sign;
1969 #else

1973  yi = (yh + (mask >> 1)) & ~mask, sign = -static_cast<uint32>(yi > yh);
1974  k = static_cast<int>(yi >> (30 - exp));

1976  return (multiply64((exp > -1) ? (((fh << (1 + exp)) & 0xFFFFFFFF) |
1977  ((fl & 0xFFFFFFFF) >> (31 - exp)))
1978  : fh,
1979  0xC90FDAA2) ^
1980  sign) -
1981  sign;

1988 inline std::pair<uint32, uint32> atan2_args(unsigned int abs) {
1989  int exp = -15;
1990  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, --exp)
1991  ;
1992  exp += abs >> 10;
1993  uint32 my = ((abs & 0x3FF) | 0x400) << 5, r = my * my;
1994  int rexp = 2 * exp;
1995  r = 0x40000000 - ((rexp > -31)
1996  ? ((r >> -rexp) |
1997  ((r & ((static_cast<uint32>(1) << -rexp) - 1)) != 0))
1998  : 1);
1999  for (rexp = 0; r < 0x40000000; r <<= 1, --rexp)
2000  ;
2001  uint32 mx = sqrt<30>(r, rexp);
2002  int d = exp - rexp;
2003  if (d < 0)
2004  return std::make_pair((d < -14)
2005  ? ((my >> (-d - 14)) + ((my >> (-d - 15)) & 1))
2006  : (my << (14 + d)),
2007  (mx << 14) + (r << 13) / mx);
2008  if (d > 0)
2009  return std::make_pair(
2010  my << 14,
2011  (d > 14)
2012  ? ((mx >> (d - 14)) + ((mx >> (d - 15)) & 1))
2013  : ((d == 14) ? mx : ((mx << (14 - d)) + (r << (13 - d)) / mx)));
2014  return std::make_pair(my << 13, (mx << 13) + (r << 12) / mx);
2015 }

2022 inline std::pair<uint32, uint32> hyperbolic_args(unsigned int abs, int &exp,
2023  unsigned int n = 32) {

2025  static_cast<uint32>((abs & 0x3FF) + ((abs > 0x3FF) << 10)) << 21,
2026  0xB8AA3B29),

2029  if (e < 14) {
2030  exp = 0;
2031  mx >>= 14 - e;
2032  } else {

2062 unsigned int exp2_post(uint32 m, int exp, bool esign, unsigned int sign = 0,
2063  unsigned int n = 32) {

2065  exp = -exp - (m != 0);
2066  if (exp < -25)
2067  return underflow<R>(sign);

2071  return overflow<R>(sign);
2072  if (!m)

2162 template <std::float_round_style R, bool S>
2163 unsigned int area(unsigned int arg) {
2164  int abs = arg & 0x7FFF, expx = (abs >> 10) + (abs <= 0x3FF) - 15, expy = -15,
2165  ilog, i;
2166  uint32 mx = static_cast<uint32>((abs & 0x3FF) | ((abs > 0x3FF) << 10)) << 20,
2167  my, r;
2168  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, --expy)
2169  ;
2170  expy += abs >> 10;
2171  r = ((abs & 0x3FF) | 0x400) << 5;
2172  r *= r;
2173  i = r >> 31;
2174  expy = 2 * expy + i;
2175  r >>= i;
2176  if (S) {
2177  if (expy < 0) {
2178  r = 0x40000000 +
2179  ((expy > -30) ? ((r >> -expy) |
2180  ((r & ((static_cast<uint32>(1) << -expy) - 1)) != 0))
2181  : 1);
2182  expy = 0;
2183  } else {
2184  r += 0x40000000 >> expy;
2185  i = r >> 31;
2186  r = (r >> i) | (r & i);
2187  expy += i;
2188  }
2189  } else {
2190  r -= 0x40000000 >> expy;
2191  for (; r < 0x40000000; r <<= 1, --expy)
2192  ;
2193  }
2194  my = sqrt<30>(r, expy);
2195  my = (my << 15) + (r << 14) / my;
2196  if (S) {
2197  mx >>= expy - expx;
2198  ilog = expy;
2199  } else {
2200  my >>= expx - expy;
2201  ilog = expx;
2202  }
2203  my += mx;
2204  i = my >> 31;
2205  static const int G = S && (R == std::round_to_nearest);
2206  return log2_post<R, 0xB8AA3B2A>(log2(my >> i, 26 + S + G) + (G << 3),
2207  ilog + i, 17,

2288 template <std::float_round_style R, bool C> unsigned int erf(unsigned int arg) {
2289  unsigned int abs = arg & 0x7FFF, sign = arg & 0x8000;
2290  f31 x(abs),
2291  x2 = x * x * f31(0xB8AA3B29, 0),
2292  t = f31(0x80000000, 0) / (f31(0x80000000, 0) + f31(0xA7BA054A, -2) * x),
2293  t2 = t * t;
2294  f31 e =
2295  ((f31(0x87DC2213, 0) * t2 + f31(0xB5F0E2AE, 0)) * t2 +
2296  f31(0x82790637, -2) -
2297  (f31(0xBA00E2B8, 0) * t2 + f31(0x91A98E62, -2)) * t) *
2298  t /
2299  ((x2.exp < 0) ? f31(exp2((x2.exp > -32) ? (x2.m >> -x2.exp) : 0, 30), 0)
2300  : f31(exp2((x2.m << x2.exp) & 0x7FFFFFFF, 22),
2301  x2.m >> (31 - x2.exp)));
2302  return (!C || sign)
2303  ? fixed2half<R, 31, false, true, true>(
2304  0x80000000 - (e.m >> (C - e.exp)), 14 + C, sign & (C - 1U))
2305  : (e.exp < -25) ? underflow<R>()
2306  : fixed2half<R, 30, false, false, true>(
2307  e.m >> 1, e.exp + 14, 0, e.m & 1);
2308 }

2350  if (z.exp >= 0) {
2351  sign &= (L | ((z.m >> (31 - z.exp)) & 1)) - 1;
2352  for (z = f31((z.m << (1 + z.exp)) & 0xFFFFFFFF, -1); z.m < 0x80000000;
2353  z.m <<= 1, --z.exp)
2354  ;
2355  }
2356  if (z.exp == -1)
2357  z = f31(0x80000000, 0) - z;
2358  if (z.exp < -1) {
2359  z = z * pi;
2360  z.m = sincos(z.m >> (1 - z.exp), 30).first;
2361  for (z.exp = 1; z.m < 0x80000000; z.m <<= 1, --z.exp)
2362  ;
2363  } else
2364  z = f31(0x80000000, 0);
2365  }
2366  if (L) {
2367  if (bsign) {
2368  f31 l(0x92868247, 0);
2369  if (z.exp < 0) {
2370  uint32 m = log2((z.m + 1) >> 1, 27);
2371  z = f31(-((static_cast<uint32>(z.exp) << 26) + (m >> 5)), 5);
2372  for (; z.m < 0x80000000; z.m <<= 1, --z.exp)
2373  ;
2374  l = l + z / lbe;
2375  }
2376  sign = static_cast<unsigned>(
2377  x.exp && (l.exp < s.exp || (l.exp == s.exp && l.m < s.m)))
2378  << 15;
2379  s = sign ? (s - l) : x.exp ? (l - s) : (l + s);
2380  } else {
2381  sign = static_cast<unsigned>(x.exp == 0) << 15;
2382  if (s.exp < -24)
2383  return underflow<R>(sign);
2384  if (s.exp > 15)
2385  return overflow<R>(sign);
2386  }
2387  } else {
2388  s = s * lbe;
2389  uint32 m;
2390  if (s.exp < 0) {
2391  m = s.m >> -s.exp;
2392  s.exp = 0;
2393  } else {
2394  m = (s.m << s.exp) & 0x7FFFFFFF;
2395  s.exp = (s.m >> (31 - s.exp));
2396  }
2397  s.m = exp2(m, 27);
2398  if (!x.exp)
2399  s = f31(0x80000000, 0) / s;
2400  if (bsign) {
2401  if (z.exp < 0)
2402  s = s * z;
2403  s = pi / s;
2404  if (s.exp < -24)
2405  return underflow<R>(sign);
2406  } else if (z.exp > 0 && !(z.m & ((1 << (31 - z.exp)) - 1)))
2407  return ((s.exp + 14) << 10) + (s.m >> 21);
2408  if (s.exp > 15)
2409  return overflow<R>(sign);
2410  }
2411  return fixed2half<R, 31, false, false, true>(s.m, s.exp + 14, sign);
2412 }
2414 
2415 template <typename, typename, std::float_round_style> struct half_caster;
2416 } // namespace detail

2701 template <typename T, typename U,
2702  std::float_round_style R = (std::float_round_style)(HALF_ROUND_STYLE)>
2703 struct half_caster {};
2704 template <typename U, std::float_round_style R> struct half_caster<half, U, R> {
2705 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_STATIC_ASSERT && HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_TYPE_TRAITS
2706  static_assert(std::is_arithmetic<U>::value,
2707  "half_cast from non-arithmetic type unsupported");
2708 #endif
2709 
2710  static half cast(U arg) { return cast_impl(arg, is_float<U>()); };
2711 
2712 private:
2713  static half cast_impl(U arg, true_type) {
2714  return half(binary, float2half<R>(arg));
2715  }
2716  static half cast_impl(U arg, false_type) {
2717  return half(binary, int2half<R>(arg));
2718  }
2719 };
2720 template <typename T, std::float_round_style R> struct half_caster<T, half, R> {
2721 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_STATIC_ASSERT && HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_TYPE_TRAITS
2722  static_assert(std::is_arithmetic<T>::value,
2723  "half_cast to non-arithmetic type unsupported");
2724 #endif
2725 
2726  static T cast(half arg) { return cast_impl(arg, is_float<T>()); }
2727 
2728 private:
2729  static T cast_impl(half arg, true_type) { return half2float<T>(arg.data_); }
2730  static T cast_impl(half arg, false_type) {
2731  return half2int<R, true, true, T>(arg.data_);
2732  }
2733 };
2734 template <std::float_round_style R> struct half_caster<half, half, R> {
2735  static half cast(half arg) { return arg; }
2736 };

2907  (x.data_ == y.data_ || !((x.data_ | y.data_) & 0x7FFF));

2930  ((y.data_ ^ (0x8000 | (0x8000 - (y.data_ >> 15)))) +
2931  (y.data_ >> 15));

2991 
3000 inline half operator+(half x, half y) {
3001 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3002  return half(detail::binary,
3003  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3004  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_) +
3005  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_)));
3006 #else
3007  int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF;
3008  bool sub = ((x.data_ ^ y.data_) & 0x8000) != 0;
3009  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00)
3010  return half(detail::binary, (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00)
3011  ? detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_)
3012  : (absy != 0x7C00) ? x.data_
3013  : (sub && absx == 0x7C00) ? detail::invalid()
3014  : y.data_);
3015  if (!absx)
3016  return absy ? y
3017  : half(detail::binary,
3018  (half::round_style == std::round_toward_neg_infinity)
3019  ? (x.data_ | y.data_)
3020  : (x.data_ & y.data_));
3021  if (!absy)
3022  return x;
3023  unsigned int sign = ((sub && absy > absx) ? y.data_ : x.data_) & 0x8000;
3024  if (absy > absx)
3025  std::swap(absx, absy);
3026  int exp = (absx >> 10) + (absx <= 0x3FF),
3027  d = exp - (absy >> 10) - (absy <= 0x3FF),
3028  mx = ((absx & 0x3FF) | ((absx > 0x3FF) << 10)) << 3, my;
3029  if (d < 13) {
3030  my = ((absy & 0x3FF) | ((absy > 0x3FF) << 10)) << 3;
3031  my = (my >> d) | ((my & ((1 << d) - 1)) != 0);
3032  } else
3033  my = 1;
3034  if (sub) {
3035  if (!(mx -= my))
3036  return half(detail::binary,
3037  static_cast<unsigned>(half::round_style ==
3038  std::round_toward_neg_infinity)
3039  << 15);
3040  for (; mx < 0x2000 && exp > 1; mx <<= 1, --exp)
3041  ;
3042  } else {
3043  mx += my;
3044  int i = mx >> 14;
3045  if ((exp += i) > 30)
3046  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>(sign));
3047  mx = (mx >> i) | (mx & i);
3048  }
3049  return half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, false>(
3050  sign + ((exp - 1) << 10) + (mx >> 3),
3051  (mx >> 2) & 1, (mx & 0x3) != 0));
3052 #endif
3053 }
3054 
3063 inline half operator-(half x, half y) {
3064 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3065  return half(detail::binary,
3066  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3067  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_) -
3068  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_)));
3069 #else
3070  return x + -y;
3071 #endif
3072 }
3073 
3082 inline half operator*(half x, half y) {
3083 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3084  return half(detail::binary,
3085  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3086  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_) *
3087  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_)));
3088 #else
3089  int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp = -16;
3090  unsigned int sign = (x.data_ ^ y.data_) & 0x8000;
3091  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00)
3092  return half(detail::binary,
3093  (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00)
3094  ? detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_)
3095  : ((absx == 0x7C00 && !absy) || (absy == 0x7C00 && !absx))
3096  ? detail::invalid()
3097  : (sign | 0x7C00));
3098  if (!absx || !absy)
3099  return half(detail::binary, sign);
3100  for (; absx < 0x400; absx <<= 1, --exp)
3101  ;
3102  for (; absy < 0x400; absy <<= 1, --exp)
3103  ;
3104  detail::uint32 m = static_cast<detail::uint32>((absx & 0x3FF) | 0x400) *
3105  static_cast<detail::uint32>((absy & 0x3FF) | 0x400);
3106  int i = m >> 21, s = m & i;
3107  exp += (absx >> 10) + (absy >> 10) + i;
3108  if (exp > 29)
3109  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>(sign));
3110  else if (exp < -11)
3111  return half(detail::binary, detail::underflow<half::round_style>(sign));
3112  return half(detail::binary,
3113  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 20, false, false, false>(
3114  m >> i, exp, sign, s));
3115 #endif
3116 }
3117 
3126 inline half operator/(half x, half y) {
3127 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3128  return half(detail::binary,
3129  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3130  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_) /
3131  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_)));
3132 #else
3133  int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp = 14;
3134  unsigned int sign = (x.data_ ^ y.data_) & 0x8000;
3135  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00)
3136  return half(detail::binary, (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00)
3137  ? detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_)
3138  : (absx == absy)
3139  ? detail::invalid()
3140  : (sign | ((absx == 0x7C00) ? 0x7C00 : 0)));
3141  if (!absx)
3142  return half(detail::binary, absy ? sign : detail::invalid());
3143  if (!absy)
3144  return half(detail::binary, detail::pole(sign));
3145  for (; absx < 0x400; absx <<= 1, --exp)
3146  ;
3147  for (; absy < 0x400; absy <<= 1, ++exp)
3148  ;
3149  detail::uint32 mx = (absx & 0x3FF) | 0x400, my = (absy & 0x3FF) | 0x400;
3150  int i = mx < my;
3151  exp += (absx >> 10) - (absy >> 10) - i;
3152  if (exp > 29)
3153  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>(sign));
3154  else if (exp < -11)
3155  return half(detail::binary, detail::underflow<half::round_style>(sign));
3156  mx <<= 12 + i;
3157  my <<= 1;
3158  return half(detail::binary,
3159  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 11, false, false, false>(
3160  mx / my, exp, sign, mx % my != 0));
3161 #endif
3162 }

3234 inline half fmod(half x, half y) {
3235  unsigned int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF,
3236  sign = x.data_ & 0x8000;
3237  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00)
3238  return half(detail::binary, (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00)
3239  ? detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_)
3240  : (absx == 0x7C00) ? detail::invalid()
3241  : x.data_);
3242  if (!absy)
3243  return half(detail::binary, detail::invalid());
3244  if (!absx)
3245  return x;
3246  if (absx == absy)
3247  return half(detail::binary, sign);
3248  return half(detail::binary, sign | detail::mod<false, false>(absx, absy));
3249 }

3259 inline half remainder(half x, half y) {
3260  unsigned int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF,
3261  sign = x.data_ & 0x8000;
3262  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00)
3263  return half(detail::binary, (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00)
3264  ? detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_)
3265  : (absx == 0x7C00) ? detail::invalid()
3266  : x.data_);
3267  if (!absy)
3268  return half(detail::binary, detail::invalid());
3269  if (absx == absy)
3270  return half(detail::binary, sign);
3271  return half(detail::binary, sign ^ detail::mod<false, true>(absx, absy));
3272 }

3281 inline half remquo(half x, half y, int *quo) {
3282  unsigned int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF,
3283  value = x.data_ & 0x8000;
3284  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00)
3285  return half(detail::binary, (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00)
3286  ? detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_)
3287  : (absx == 0x7C00) ? detail::invalid()
3288  : (*quo = 0, x.data_));
3289  if (!absy)
3290  return half(detail::binary, detail::invalid());
3291  bool qsign = ((value ^ y.data_) & 0x8000) != 0;
3292  int q = 1;
3293  if (absx != absy)
3294  value ^= detail::mod<true, true>(absx, absy, &q);
3295  return *quo = qsign ? -q : q, half(detail::binary, value);
3296 }

3308 inline half fma(half x, half y, half z) {
3309 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3310  detail::internal_t fx = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_),
3311  fy = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_),
3312  fz = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(z.data_);
3313 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH && FP_FAST_FMA
3314  return half(detail::binary,
3315  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::fma(fx, fy, fz)));
3316 #else
3317  return half(detail::binary,
3318  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(fx * fy + fz));
3319 #endif
3320 #else
3321  int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF, absz = z.data_ & 0x7FFF,
3322  exp = -15;
3323  unsigned int sign = (x.data_ ^ y.data_) & 0x8000;
3324  bool sub = ((sign ^ z.data_) & 0x8000) != 0;
3325  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00 || absz >= 0x7C00)
3326  return (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00 || absz > 0x7C00)
3327  ? half(detail::binary, detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_, z.data_))
3328  : (absx == 0x7C00)
3329  ? half(detail::binary, (!absy || (sub && absz == 0x7C00))
3330  ? detail::invalid()
3331  : (sign | 0x7C00))
3332  : (absy == 0x7C00)
3333  ? half(detail::binary, (!absx || (sub && absz == 0x7C00))
3334  ? detail::invalid()
3335  : (sign | 0x7C00))
3336  : z;
3337  if (!absx || !absy)
3338  return absz ? z
3339  : half(detail::binary,
3340  (half::round_style == std::round_toward_neg_infinity)
3341  ? (z.data_ | sign)
3342  : (z.data_ & sign));
3343  for (; absx < 0x400; absx <<= 1, --exp)
3344  ;
3345  for (; absy < 0x400; absy <<= 1, --exp)
3346  ;
3347  detail::uint32 m = static_cast<detail::uint32>((absx & 0x3FF) | 0x400) *
3348  static_cast<detail::uint32>((absy & 0x3FF) | 0x400);
3349  int i = m >> 21;
3350  exp += (absx >> 10) + (absy >> 10) + i;
3351  m <<= 3 - i;
3352  if (absz) {
3353  int expz = 0;
3354  for (; absz < 0x400; absz <<= 1, --expz)
3355  ;
3356  expz += absz >> 10;
3357  detail::uint32 mz = static_cast<detail::uint32>((absz & 0x3FF) | 0x400)
3358  << 13;
3359  if (expz > exp || (expz == exp && mz > m)) {
3360  std::swap(m, mz);
3361  std::swap(exp, expz);
3362  if (sub)
3363  sign = z.data_ & 0x8000;
3364  }
3365  int d = exp - expz;
3366  mz = (d < 23) ? ((mz >> d) |
3367  ((mz & ((static_cast<detail::uint32>(1) << d) - 1)) != 0))
3368  : 1;
3369  if (sub) {
3370  m = m - mz;
3371  if (!m)
3372  return half(detail::binary,
3373  static_cast<unsigned>(half::round_style ==
3374  std::round_toward_neg_infinity)
3375  << 15);
3376  for (; m < 0x800000; m <<= 1, --exp)
3377  ;
3378  } else {
3379  m += mz;
3380  i = m >> 24;
3381  m = (m >> i) | (m & i);
3382  exp += i;
3383  }
3384  }
3385  if (exp > 30)
3386  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>(sign));
3387  else if (exp < -10)
3388  return half(detail::binary, detail::underflow<half::round_style>(sign));
3389  return half(detail::binary,
3390  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 23, false, false, false>(
3391  m, exp - 1, sign));
3392 #endif
3393 }

3400 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR_NOERR half fmax(half x, half y) {
3401  return half(
3402  detail::binary,
3403  (!isnan(y) &&
3404  (isnan(x) || (x.data_ ^ (0x8000 | (0x8000 - (x.data_ >> 15)))) <
3405  (y.data_ ^ (0x8000 | (0x8000 - (y.data_ >> 15))))))
3406  ? detail::select(y.data_, x.data_)
3407  : detail::select(x.data_, y.data_));
3408 }

3436  (y.data_ ^ (0x8000 | (0x8000 - (y.data_ >> 15))))

3465 inline half exp(half arg) {
3466 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3467  return half(detail::binary,
3468  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3469  std::exp(detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3470 #else
3471  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, e = (abs >> 10) + (abs <= 0x3FF), exp;
3472  if (!abs)
3473  return half(detail::binary, 0x3C00);
3474  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
3475  return half(detail::binary, (abs == 0x7C00)
3476  ? (0x7C00 & ((arg.data_ >> 15) - 1U))
3477  : detail::signal(arg.data_));
3478  if (abs >= 0x4C80)
3479  return half(detail::binary, (arg.data_ & 0x8000)
3480  ? detail::underflow<half::round_style>()
3481  : detail::overflow<half::round_style>());
3482  detail::uint32 m = detail::multiply64(
3483  static_cast<detail::uint32>((abs & 0x3FF) + ((abs > 0x3FF) << 10)) << 21,
3484  0xB8AA3B29);
3485  if (e < 14) {
3486  exp = 0;
3487  m >>= 14 - e;
3488  } else {
3489  exp = m >> (45 - e);
3490  m = (m << (e - 14)) & 0x7FFFFFFF;
3491  }
3492  return half(detail::binary, detail::exp2_post<half::round_style>(
3493  m, exp, (arg.data_ & 0x8000) != 0, 0, 26));
3494 #endif
3495 }

3505 inline half exp2(half arg) {
3506 #if defined(HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE) && HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
3507  return half(detail::binary,
3508  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::exp2(
3509  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3510 #else
3511  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, e = (abs >> 10) + (abs <= 0x3FF),
3512  exp = (abs & 0x3FF) + ((abs > 0x3FF) << 10);
3513  if (!abs)
3514  return half(detail::binary, 0x3C00);
3515  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
3516  return half(detail::binary, (abs == 0x7C00)
3517  ? (0x7C00 & ((arg.data_ >> 15) - 1U))
3518  : detail::signal(arg.data_));
3519  if (abs >= 0x4E40)
3520  return half(detail::binary, (arg.data_ & 0x8000)
3521  ? detail::underflow<half::round_style>()
3522  : detail::overflow<half::round_style>());
3523  return half(detail::binary,
3524  detail::exp2_post<half::round_style>(
3525  (static_cast<detail::uint32>(exp) << (6 + e)) & 0x7FFFFFFF,
3526  exp >> (25 - e), (arg.data_ & 0x8000) != 0, 0, 28));
3527 #endif

3540 inline half expm1(half arg) {
3541 #if defined(HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE) && HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
3542  return half(detail::binary,
3543  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::expm1(
3544  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3545 #else
3546  unsigned int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, sign = arg.data_ & 0x8000,
3547  e = (abs >> 10) + (abs <= 0x3FF), exp;
3548  if (!abs)
3549  return arg;
3550  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
3551  return half(detail::binary, (abs == 0x7C00) ? (0x7C00 + (sign >> 1))
3552  : detail::signal(arg.data_));
3553  if (abs >= 0x4A00)
3554  return half(detail::binary,
3555  (arg.data_ & 0x8000)
3556  ? detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(0xBBFF, 1, 1)
3557  : detail::overflow<half::round_style>());
3558  detail::uint32 m = detail::multiply64(
3559  static_cast<detail::uint32>((abs & 0x3FF) + ((abs > 0x3FF) << 10)) << 21,
3560  0xB8AA3B29);
3561  if (e < 14) {
3562  exp = 0;
3563  m >>= 14 - e;
3564  } else {
3565  exp = m >> (45 - e);
3566  m = (m << (e - 14)) & 0x7FFFFFFF;
3567  }
3568  m = detail::exp2(m);
3569  if (sign) {
3570  int s = 0;
3571  if (m > 0x80000000) {
3572  ++exp;
3573  m = detail::divide64(0x80000000, m, s);
3574  }
3575  m = 0x80000000 -
3576  ((m >> exp) |
3577  ((m & ((static_cast<detail::uint32>(1) << exp) - 1)) != 0) | s);
3578  exp = 0;
3579  } else
3580  m -= (exp < 31) ? (0x80000000 >> exp) : 1;
3581  for (exp += 14; m < 0x80000000 && exp; m <<= 1, --exp)
3582  ;
3583  if (exp > 29)
3584  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>());
3585  return half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
3586  sign + (exp << 10) + (m >> 21), (m >> 20) & 1,
3587  (m & 0xFFFFF) != 0));
3588 #endif
3589 }

3600 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE

3602  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3603  std::log(detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3604 #else

3607  return half(detail::binary, detail::pole(0x8000));
3608  if (arg.data_ & 0x8000)
3609  return half(detail::binary, (arg.data_ <= 0xFC00)
3610  ? detail::invalid()
3611  : detail::signal(arg.data_));
3612  if (abs >= 0x7C00)

3683 inline half log2(half arg) {
3684 #if defined(HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE) && HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
3685  return half(detail::binary,
3686  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::log2(
3687  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3688 #else
3689  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp = -15, s = 0;
3690  if (!abs)
3691  return half(detail::binary, detail::pole(0x8000));
3692  if (arg.data_ & 0x8000)
3693  return half(detail::binary, (arg.data_ <= 0xFC00)
3694  ? detail::invalid()
3695  : detail::signal(arg.data_));
3696  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
3697  return (abs == 0x7C00) ? arg
3698  : half(detail::binary, detail::signal(arg.data_));
3699  if (abs == 0x3C00)
3700  return half(detail::binary, 0);
3701  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, --exp)
3702  ;
3703  exp += (abs >> 10);
3704  if (!(abs & 0x3FF)) {
3705  unsigned int value = static_cast<unsigned>(exp < 0) << 15, m = std::abs(exp)
3706  << 6;
3707  for (exp = 18; m < 0x400; m <<= 1, --exp)
3708  ;
3709  return half(detail::binary, value + (exp << 10) + m);
3710  }
3711  detail::uint32 ilog = exp, sign = detail::sign_mask(ilog),
3712  m = (((ilog << 27) +
3713  (detail::log2(
3714  static_cast<detail::uint32>((abs & 0x3FF) | 0x400)
3715  << 20,
3716  28) >>
3717  4)) ^
3718  sign) -
3719  sign;
3720  if (!m)
3721  return half(detail::binary, 0);
3722  for (exp = 14; m < 0x8000000 && exp; m <<= 1, --exp)
3723  ;
3724  for (; m > 0xFFFFFFF; m >>= 1, ++exp)
3725  s |= m & 1;
3726  return half(detail::binary,
3727  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 27, false, false, true>(
3728  m, exp, sign & 0x8000, s));
3729 #endif
3730 }

3743 inline half log1p(half arg) {
3744 #if defined(HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE) && HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
3745  return half(detail::binary,
3746  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::log1p(
3747  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3748 #else
3749  if (arg.data_ >= 0xBC00)
3750  return half(detail::binary, (arg.data_ == 0xBC00) ? detail::pole(0x8000)
3751  : (arg.data_ <= 0xFC00)
3752  ? detail::invalid()
3753  : detail::signal(arg.data_));
3754  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp = -15;
3755  if (!abs || abs >= 0x7C00)
3756  return (abs > 0x7C00) ? half(detail::binary, detail::signal(arg.data_))
3757  : arg;
3758  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, --exp)
3759  ;
3760  exp += abs >> 10;
3761  detail::uint32 m = static_cast<detail::uint32>((abs & 0x3FF) | 0x400) << 20;
3762  if (arg.data_ & 0x8000) {
3763  m = 0x40000000 - (m >> -exp);
3764  for (exp = 0; m < 0x40000000; m <<= 1, --exp)
3765  ;
3766  } else {
3767  if (exp < 0) {
3768  m = 0x40000000 + (m >> -exp);
3769  exp = 0;
3770  } else {
3771  m += 0x40000000 >> exp;
3772  int i = m >> 31;
3773  m >>= i;
3774  exp += i;
3775  }
3776  }
3777  return half(detail::binary, detail::log2_post<half::round_style, 0xB8AA3B2A>(
3778  detail::log2(m), exp, 17));
3779 #endif

3795 inline half sqrt(half arg) {

3798  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::sqrt(
3799  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3800 #else

3802  if (!abs || arg.data_ >= 0x7C00)
3803  return half(detail::binary, (abs > 0x7C00) ? detail::signal(arg.data_)
3804  : (arg.data_ > 0x8000) ? detail::invalid()
3805  : arg.data_);

3807  ;

3809  m = detail::sqrt<20>(r, exp += abs >> 10);

3813 }

3821 inline half rsqrt(half arg) {
3822 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3823  return half(
3824  detail::binary,
3825  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3826  detail::internal_t(1) /
3827  std::sqrt(detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3828 #else
3829  unsigned int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, bias = 0x4000;
3830  if (!abs || arg.data_ >= 0x7C00)
3831  return half(detail::binary, (abs > 0x7C00) ? detail::signal(arg.data_)
3832  : (arg.data_ > 0x8000) ? detail::invalid()
3833  : !abs ? detail::pole(arg.data_ & 0x8000)
3834  : 0);
3835  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, bias -= 0x400)
3836  ;
3837  unsigned int frac = (abs += bias) & 0x7FF;
3838  if (frac == 0x400)
3839  return half(detail::binary, 0x7A00 - (abs >> 1));
3840  if ((half::round_style == std::round_to_nearest &&
3841  (frac == 0x3FE || frac == 0x76C)) ||
3842  (half::round_style != std::round_to_nearest &&
3843  (frac == 0x15A || frac == 0x3FC || frac == 0x401 || frac == 0x402 ||
3844  frac == 0x67B)))
3845  return pow(arg, half(detail::binary, 0xB800));
3846  detail::uint32 f = 0x17376 - abs, mx = (abs & 0x3FF) | 0x400,
3847  my = ((f >> 1) & 0x3FF) | 0x400, mz = my * my;
3848  int expy = (f >> 11) - 31, expx = 32 - (abs >> 10), i = mz >> 21;
3849  for (mz = 0x60000000 - (((mz >> i) * mx) >> (expx - 2 * expy - i));
3850  mz < 0x40000000; mz <<= 1, --expy)
3851  ;
3852  i = (my *= mz >> 10) >> 31;
3853  expy += i;
3854  my = (my >> (20 + i)) + 1;
3855  i = (mz = my * my) >> 21;
3856  for (mz = 0x60000000 - (((mz >> i) * mx) >> (expx - 2 * expy - i));
3857  mz < 0x40000000; mz <<= 1, --expy)
3858  ;
3859  i = (my *= (mz >> 10) + 1) >> 31;
3860  return half(detail::binary,
3861  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 30, false, false, true>(
3862  my >> i, expy + i + 14));
3863 #endif
3864 }
3865 
3873 inline half cbrt(half arg) {
3874 #if defined(HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE) && HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
3875  return half(detail::binary,
3876  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::cbrt(
3877  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
3878 #else
3879  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp = -15;
3880  if (!abs || abs == 0x3C00 || abs >= 0x7C00)
3881  return (abs > 0x7C00) ? half(detail::binary, detail::signal(arg.data_))
3882  : arg;
3883  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, --exp)
3884  ;
3885  detail::uint32 ilog = exp + (abs >> 10), sign = detail::sign_mask(ilog), f,
3886  m = (((ilog << 27) +
3887  (detail::log2(
3888  static_cast<detail::uint32>((abs & 0x3FF) | 0x400)
3889  << 20,
3890  24) >>
3891  4)) ^
3892  sign) -
3893  sign;
3894  for (exp = 2; m < 0x80000000; m <<= 1, --exp)
3895  ;
3896  m = detail::multiply64(m, 0xAAAAAAAB);
3897  int i = m >> 31, s;
3898  exp += i;
3899  m <<= 1 - i;
3900  if (exp < 0) {
3901  f = m >> -exp;
3902  exp = 0;
3903  } else {
3904  f = (m << exp) & 0x7FFFFFFF;
3905  exp = m >> (31 - exp);
3906  }
3907  m = detail::exp2(f, (half::round_style == std::round_to_nearest) ? 29 : 26);
3908  if (sign) {
3909  if (m > 0x80000000) {
3910  m = detail::divide64(0x80000000, m, s);
3911  ++exp;
3912  }
3913  exp = -exp;
3914  }
3915  return half(
3916  detail::binary,
3917  (half::round_style == std::round_to_nearest)
3918  ? detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 31, false, false, false>(
3919  m, exp + 14, arg.data_ & 0x8000)
3920  : detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 23, false, false, false>(
3921  (m + 0x80) >> 8, exp + 14, arg.data_ & 0x8000));
3922 #endif
3923 }
3924 
3934 inline half hypot(half x, half y) {
3935 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3936  detail::internal_t fx = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_),
3937  fy = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_);
3938 #if HALF_ENABLE_CPP11_CMATH
3939  return half(detail::binary,
3940  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::hypot(fx, fy)));
3941 #else
3942  return half(detail::binary, detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3943  std::sqrt(fx * fx + fy * fy)));
3944 #endif
3945 #else
3946  int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF, expx = 0, expy = 0;
3947  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00)
3948  return half(detail::binary,
3949  (absx == 0x7C00) ? detail::select(0x7C00, y.data_)
3950  : (absy == 0x7C00) ? detail::select(0x7C00, x.data_)
3951  : detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_));
3952  if (!absx)
3953  return half(detail::binary, absy ? detail::check_underflow(absy) : 0);
3954  if (!absy)
3955  return half(detail::binary, detail::check_underflow(absx));
3956  if (absy > absx)
3957  std::swap(absx, absy);
3958  for (; absx < 0x400; absx <<= 1, --expx)
3959  ;
3960  for (; absy < 0x400; absy <<= 1, --expy)
3961  ;
3962  detail::uint32 mx = (absx & 0x3FF) | 0x400, my = (absy & 0x3FF) | 0x400;
3963  mx *= mx;
3964  my *= my;
3965  int ix = mx >> 21, iy = my >> 21;
3966  expx = 2 * (expx + (absx >> 10)) - 15 + ix;
3967  expy = 2 * (expy + (absy >> 10)) - 15 + iy;
3968  mx <<= 10 - ix;
3969  my <<= 10 - iy;
3970  int d = expx - expy;
3971  my = (d < 30) ? ((my >> d) |
3972  ((my & ((static_cast<detail::uint32>(1) << d) - 1)) != 0))
3973  : 1;
3974  return half(detail::binary,
3975  detail::hypot_post<half::round_style>(mx + my, expx));
3976 #endif
3977 }
3978 
3989 inline half hypot(half x, half y, half z) {
3990 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
3991  detail::internal_t fx = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_),
3992  fy = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_),
3993  fz = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(z.data_);
3994  return half(detail::binary, detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
3995  std::sqrt(fx * fx + fy * fy + fz * fz)));
3996 #else
3997  int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF, absz = z.data_ & 0x7FFF,
3998  expx = 0, expy = 0, expz = 0;
3999  if (!absx)
4000  return hypot(y, z);
4001  if (!absy)
4002  return hypot(x, z);
4003  if (!absz)
4004  return hypot(x, y);
4005  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00 || absz >= 0x7C00)
4006  return half(detail::binary,
4007  (absx == 0x7C00)
4008  ? detail::select(0x7C00, detail::select(y.data_, z.data_))
4009  : (absy == 0x7C00)
4010  ? detail::select(0x7C00, detail::select(x.data_, z.data_))
4011  : (absz == 0x7C00)
4012  ? detail::select(0x7C00, detail::select(x.data_, y.data_))
4013  : detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_, z.data_));
4014  if (absz > absy)
4015  std::swap(absy, absz);
4016  if (absy > absx)
4017  std::swap(absx, absy);
4018  if (absz > absy)
4019  std::swap(absy, absz);
4020  for (; absx < 0x400; absx <<= 1, --expx)
4021  ;
4022  for (; absy < 0x400; absy <<= 1, --expy)
4023  ;
4024  for (; absz < 0x400; absz <<= 1, --expz)
4025  ;
4026  detail::uint32 mx = (absx & 0x3FF) | 0x400, my = (absy & 0x3FF) | 0x400,
4027  mz = (absz & 0x3FF) | 0x400;
4028  mx *= mx;
4029  my *= my;
4030  mz *= mz;
4031  int ix = mx >> 21, iy = my >> 21, iz = mz >> 21;
4032  expx = 2 * (expx + (absx >> 10)) - 15 + ix;
4033  expy = 2 * (expy + (absy >> 10)) - 15 + iy;
4034  expz = 2 * (expz + (absz >> 10)) - 15 + iz;
4035  mx <<= 10 - ix;
4036  my <<= 10 - iy;
4037  mz <<= 10 - iz;
4038  int d = expy - expz;
4039  mz = (d < 30) ? ((mz >> d) |
4040  ((mz & ((static_cast<detail::uint32>(1) << d) - 1)) != 0))
4041  : 1;
4042  my += mz;
4043  if (my & 0x80000000) {
4044  my = (my >> 1) | (my & 1);
4045  if (++expy > expx) {
4046  std::swap(mx, my);
4047  std::swap(expx, expy);
4048  }
4049  }
4050  d = expx - expy;
4051  my = (d < 30) ? ((my >> d) |
4052  ((my & ((static_cast<detail::uint32>(1) << d) - 1)) != 0))
4053  : 1;
4054  return half(detail::binary,
4055  detail::hypot_post<half::round_style>(mx + my, expx));
4056 #endif
4057 }

4070 inline half pow(half x, half y) {
4071 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4072  return half(detail::binary,
4073  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
4074  std::pow(detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_),
4075  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_))));
4076 #else
4077  int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp = -15;
4078  if (!absy || x.data_ == 0x3C00)
4079  return half(
4080  detail::binary,
4081  detail::select(0x3C00, (x.data_ == 0x3C00) ? y.data_ : x.data_));
4082  bool is_int = absy >= 0x6400 ||
4083  (absy >= 0x3C00 && !(absy & ((1 << (25 - (absy >> 10))) - 1)));
4084  unsigned int sign =
4085  x.data_ & (static_cast<unsigned>((absy < 0x6800) && is_int &&
4086  ((absy >> (25 - (absy >> 10))) & 1))
4087  << 15);
4088  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00)
4089  return half(detail::binary,
4090  (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00)
4091  ? detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_)
4092  : (absy == 0x7C00)
4093  ? ((absx == 0x3C00) ? 0x3C00
4094  : (!absx && y.data_ == 0xFC00)
4095  ? detail::pole()
4096  : (0x7C00 & -((y.data_ >> 15) ^ (absx > 0x3C00))))
4097  : (sign | (0x7C00 & ((y.data_ >> 15) - 1U))));
4098  if (!absx)
4099  return half(detail::binary, (y.data_ & 0x8000) ? detail::pole(sign) : sign);
4100  if ((x.data_ & 0x8000) && !is_int)
4101  return half(detail::binary, detail::invalid());
4102  if (x.data_ == 0xBC00)
4103  return half(detail::binary, sign | 0x3C00);
4104  switch (y.data_) {
4105  case 0x3800:
4106  return sqrt(x);
4107  case 0x3C00:
4108  return half(detail::binary, detail::check_underflow(x.data_));
4109  case 0x4000:
4110  return x * x;
4111  case 0xBC00:
4112  return half(detail::binary, 0x3C00) / x;
4113  }
4114  for (; absx < 0x400; absx <<= 1, --exp)
4115  ;
4116  detail::uint32 ilog = exp + (absx >> 10), msign = detail::sign_mask(ilog), f,
4117  m = (((ilog << 27) +
4118  ((detail::log2(
4119  static_cast<detail::uint32>((absx & 0x3FF) | 0x400)
4120  << 20) +
4121  8) >>
4122  4)) ^
4123  msign) -
4124  msign;
4125  for (exp = -11; m < 0x80000000; m <<= 1, --exp)
4126  ;
4127  for (; absy < 0x400; absy <<= 1, --exp)
4128  ;
4129  m = detail::multiply64(m, static_cast<detail::uint32>((absy & 0x3FF) | 0x400)
4130  << 21);
4131  int i = m >> 31;
4132  exp += (absy >> 10) + i;
4133  m <<= 1 - i;
4134  if (exp < 0) {
4135  f = m >> -exp;
4136  exp = 0;
4137  } else {
4138  f = (m << exp) & 0x7FFFFFFF;
4139  exp = m >> (31 - exp);
4140  }
4141  return half(detail::binary,
4142  detail::exp2_post<half::round_style>(
4143  f, exp, ((msign & 1) ^ (y.data_ >> 15)) != 0, sign));
4144 #endif
4145 }

4162 inline void sincos(half arg, half *sin, half *cos) {
4163 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4164  detail::internal_t f = detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_);
4165  *sin =
4166  half(detail::binary, detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::sin(f)));
4167  *cos =
4168  half(detail::binary, detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::cos(f)));
4169 #else
4170  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, sign = arg.data_ >> 15, k;
4171  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
4172  *sin = *cos =
4173  half(detail::binary,
4174  (abs == 0x7C00) ? detail::invalid() : detail::signal(arg.data_));
4175  else if (!abs) {
4176  *sin = arg;
4177  *cos = half(detail::binary, 0x3C00);
4178  } else if (abs < 0x2500) {
4179  *sin = half(detail::binary,
4180  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(arg.data_ - 1, 1, 1));
4181  *cos = half(detail::binary,
4182  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(0x3BFF, 1, 1));
4183  } else {
4184  if (half::round_style != std::round_to_nearest) {
4185  switch (abs) {
4186  case 0x48B7:
4187  *sin = half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4188  (~arg.data_ & 0x8000) | 0x1D07, 1, 1));
4189  *cos = half(detail::binary,
4190  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(0xBBFF, 1, 1));
4191  return;
4192  case 0x598C:
4193  *sin = half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4194  (arg.data_ & 0x8000) | 0x3BFF, 1, 1));
4195  *cos = half(detail::binary,
4196  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(0x80FC, 1, 1));
4197  return;
4198  case 0x6A64:
4199  *sin = half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4200  (~arg.data_ & 0x8000) | 0x3BFE, 1, 1));
4201  *cos = half(detail::binary,
4202  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(0x27FF, 1, 1));
4203  return;
4204  case 0x6D8C:
4205  *sin = half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4206  (arg.data_ & 0x8000) | 0x0FE6, 1, 1));
4207  *cos = half(detail::binary,
4208  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(0x3BFF, 1, 1));
4209  return;
4210  }
4211  }
4212  std::pair<detail::uint32, detail::uint32> sc =
4213  detail::sincos(detail::angle_arg(abs, k), 28);
4214  switch (k & 3) {
4215  case 1:
4216  sc = std::make_pair(sc.second, -sc.first);
4217  break;
4218  case 2:
4219  sc = std::make_pair(-sc.first, -sc.second);
4220  break;
4221  case 3:
4222  sc = std::make_pair(-sc.second, sc.first);
4223  break;
4224  }
4225  *sin = half(detail::binary,
4226  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 30, true, true, true>(
4227  (sc.first ^ -static_cast<detail::uint32>(sign)) + sign));
4228  *cos = half(
4229  detail::binary,
4230  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 30, true, true, true>(sc.second));
4231  }
4232 #endif
4233 }

4248 #else

4323 inline half tan(half arg) {
4324 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4325  return half(detail::binary,
4326  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
4327  std::tan(detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
4328 #else
4329  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp = 13, k;
4330  if (!abs)
4331  return arg;
4332  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
4333  return half(detail::binary, (abs == 0x7C00) ? detail::invalid()
4334  : detail::signal(arg.data_));
4335  if (abs < 0x2700)
4336  return half(detail::binary,
4337  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(arg.data_, 0, 1));
4338  if (half::round_style != std::round_to_nearest)
4339  switch (abs) {
4340  case 0x658C:
4341  return half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4342  (arg.data_ & 0x8000) | 0x07E6, 1, 1));
4343  case 0x7330:
4344  return half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4345  (~arg.data_ & 0x8000) | 0x4B62, 1, 1));
4346  }
4347  std::pair<detail::uint32, detail::uint32> sc =
4348  detail::sincos(detail::angle_arg(abs, k), 30);
4349  if (k & 1)
4350  sc = std::make_pair(-sc.second, sc.first);
4351  detail::uint32 signy = detail::sign_mask(sc.first),
4352  signx = detail::sign_mask(sc.second);
4353  detail::uint32 my = (sc.first ^ signy) - signy,
4354  mx = (sc.second ^ signx) - signx;
4355  for (; my < 0x80000000; my <<= 1, --exp)
4356  ;

4358  ;
4359  return half(detail::binary,

4373 inline half asin(half arg) {
4374 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4375  return half(detail::binary,
4376  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::asin(
4377  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
4378 #else
4379  unsigned int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, sign = arg.data_ & 0x8000;
4380  if (!abs)
4381  return arg;
4382  if (abs >= 0x3C00)
4383  return half(detail::binary, (abs > 0x7C00) ? detail::signal(arg.data_)
4384  : (abs > 0x3C00)
4385  ? detail::invalid()
4386  : detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4387  sign | 0x3E48, 0, 1));
4388  if (abs < 0x2900)
4389  return half(detail::binary,
4390  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(arg.data_, 0, 1));
4391  if (half::round_style != std::round_to_nearest &&
4392  (abs == 0x2B44 || abs == 0x2DC3))
4393  return half(detail::binary,
4394  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(arg.data_ + 1, 1, 1));
4395  std::pair<detail::uint32, detail::uint32> sc = detail::atan2_args(abs);
4396  detail::uint32 m =
4397  detail::atan2(sc.first, sc.second,
4398  (half::round_style == std::round_to_nearest) ? 27 : 26);
4399  return half(detail::binary,
4400  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 30, false, true, true>(
4401  m, 14, sign));
4402 #endif
4403 }

4413 inline half acos(half arg) {
4414 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4415  return half(detail::binary,
4416  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::acos(
4417  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
4418 #else
4419  unsigned int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, sign = arg.data_ >> 15;
4420  if (!abs)
4421  return half(detail::binary,
4422  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(0x3E48, 0, 1));
4423  if (abs >= 0x3C00)
4424  return half(detail::binary,
4425  (abs > 0x7C00) ? detail::signal(arg.data_)
4426  : (abs > 0x3C00) ? detail::invalid()
4427  : sign ? detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(0x4248, 0, 1)
4428  : 0);
4429  std::pair<detail::uint32, detail::uint32> cs = detail::atan2_args(abs);
4430  detail::uint32 m = detail::atan2(cs.second, cs.first, 28);
4431  return half(detail::binary,
4432  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 31, false, true, true>(
4433  sign ? (0xC90FDAA2 - m) : m, 15, 0, sign));
4434 #endif
4435 }

4445 inline half atan(half arg) {
4446 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4447  return half(detail::binary,
4448  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::atan(
4449  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
4450 #else
4451  unsigned int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, sign = arg.data_ & 0x8000;
4452  if (!abs)
4453  return arg;
4454  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
4455  return half(detail::binary, (abs == 0x7C00)
4456  ? detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4457  sign | 0x3E48, 0, 1)
4458  : detail::signal(arg.data_));
4459  if (abs <= 0x2700)
4460  return half(detail::binary,
4461  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(arg.data_ - 1, 1, 1));
4462  int exp = (abs >> 10) + (abs <= 0x3FF);
4463  detail::uint32 my = (abs & 0x3FF) | ((abs > 0x3FF) << 10);
4464  detail::uint32 m =
4465  (exp > 15)
4466  ? detail::atan2(my << 19, 0x20000000 >> (exp - 15),
4467  (half::round_style == std::round_to_nearest) ? 26
4468  : 24)
4469  : detail::atan2(my << (exp + 4), 0x20000000,
4470  (half::round_style == std::round_to_nearest) ? 30
4471  : 28);
4472  return half(detail::binary,
4473  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 30, false, true, true>(
4474  m, 14, sign));
4475 #endif
4476 }

4489 inline half atan2(half y, half x) {
4490 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4491  return half(detail::binary,
4492  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(
4493  std::atan2(detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(y.data_),
4494  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(x.data_))));
4495 #else
4496  unsigned int absx = x.data_ & 0x7FFF, absy = y.data_ & 0x7FFF,
4497  signx = x.data_ >> 15, signy = y.data_ & 0x8000;
4498  if (absx >= 0x7C00 || absy >= 0x7C00) {
4499  if (absx > 0x7C00 || absy > 0x7C00)
4500  return half(detail::binary, detail::signal(x.data_, y.data_));
4501  if (absy == 0x7C00)
4502  return half(
4503  detail::binary,
4504  (absx < 0x7C00)
4505  ? detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(signy | 0x3E48, 0, 1)
4506  : signx
4507  ? detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(signy | 0x40B6, 0, 1)
4508  : detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(signy | 0x3A48, 0, 1));
4509  return (x.data_ == 0x7C00)
4510  ? half(detail::binary, signy)
4511  : half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4512  signy | 0x4248, 0, 1));
4513  }
4514  if (!absy)
4515  return signx
4516  ? half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4517  signy | 0x4248, 0, 1))
4518  : y;
4519  if (!absx)
4520  return half(detail::binary,
4521  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(signy | 0x3E48, 0, 1));
4522  int d = (absy >> 10) + (absy <= 0x3FF) - (absx >> 10) - (absx <= 0x3FF);
4523  if (d > (signx ? 18 : 12))
4524  return half(detail::binary,
4525  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(signy | 0x3E48, 0, 1));
4526  if (signx && d < -11)
4527  return half(detail::binary,
4528  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(signy | 0x4248, 0, 1));
4529  if (!signx &&
4530  d < ((half::round_style == std::round_toward_zero) ? -15 : -9)) {
4531  for (; absy < 0x400; absy <<= 1, --d)
4532  ;
4533  detail::uint32 mx = ((absx << 1) & 0x7FF) | 0x800,
4534  my = ((absy << 1) & 0x7FF) | 0x800;
4535  int i = my < mx;
4536  d -= i;
4537  if (d < -25)
4538  return half(detail::binary, detail::underflow<half::round_style>(signy));
4539  my <<= 11 + i;
4540  return half(detail::binary,
4541  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 11, false, false, true>(
4542  my / mx, d + 14, signy, my % mx != 0));
4543  }
4544  detail::uint32 m = detail::atan2(
4545  ((absy & 0x3FF) | ((absy > 0x3FF) << 10)) << (19 + ((d < 0) ? d
4546  : (d > 0) ? 0
4547  : -1)),
4548  ((absx & 0x3FF) | ((absx > 0x3FF) << 10)) << (19 - ((d > 0) ? d
4549  : (d < 0) ? 0
4550  : 1)));
4551  return half(detail::binary,
4552  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 31, false, true, true>(
4553  signx ? (0xC90FDAA2 - m) : m, 15, signy, signx));
4554 #endif
4555 }

4570 inline half sinh(half arg) {
4571 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4572  return half(detail::binary,
4573  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::sinh(
4574  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
4575 #else
4576  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp;
4577  if (!abs || abs >= 0x7C00)
4578  return (abs > 0x7C00) ? half(detail::binary, detail::signal(arg.data_))
4579  : arg;
4580  if (abs <= 0x2900)
4581  return half(detail::binary,
4582  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(arg.data_, 0, 1));
4583  std::pair<detail::uint32, detail::uint32> mm = detail::hyperbolic_args(
4584  abs, exp, (half::round_style == std::round_to_nearest) ? 29 : 27);
4585  detail::uint32 m = mm.first - mm.second;
4586  for (exp += 13; m < 0x80000000 && exp; m <<= 1, --exp)
4587  ;
4588  unsigned int sign = arg.data_ & 0x8000;
4589  if (exp > 29)
4590  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>(sign));
4591  return half(detail::binary,
4592  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 31, false, false, true>(
4593  m, exp, sign));
4594 #endif
4595 }

4605 inline half cosh(half arg) {
4606 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4607  return half(detail::binary,
4608  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::cosh(
4609  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
4610 #else
4611  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp;
4612  if (!abs)
4613  return half(detail::binary, 0x3C00);
4614  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
4615  return half(detail::binary,
4616  (abs > 0x7C00) ? detail::signal(arg.data_) : 0x7C00);
4617  std::pair<detail::uint32, detail::uint32> mm = detail::hyperbolic_args(
4618  abs, exp, (half::round_style == std::round_to_nearest) ? 23 : 26);
4619  detail::uint32 m = mm.first + mm.second, i = (~m & 0xFFFFFFFF) >> 31;
4620  m = (m >> i) | (m & i) | 0x80000000;
4621  if ((exp += 13 + i) > 29)
4622  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>());
4623  return half(
4624  detail::binary,
4625  detail::fixed2half<half::round_style, 31, false, false, true>(m, exp));
4626 #endif
4627 }

4637 inline half tanh(half arg) {
4638 #ifdef HALF_ARITHMETIC_TYPE
4639  return half(detail::binary,
4640  detail::float2half<half::round_style>(std::tanh(
4641  detail::half2float<detail::internal_t>(arg.data_))));
4642 #else
4643  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp;
4644  if (!abs)
4645  return arg;
4646  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
4647  return half(detail::binary, (abs > 0x7C00) ? detail::signal(arg.data_)
4648  : (arg.data_ - 0x4000));
4649  if (abs >= 0x4500)
4650  return half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(
4651  (arg.data_ & 0x8000) | 0x3BFF, 1, 1));
4652  if (abs < 0x2700)
4653  return half(detail::binary,
4654  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(arg.data_ - 1, 1, 1));
4655  if (half::round_style != std::round_to_nearest && abs == 0x2D3F)
4656  return half(detail::binary,
4657  detail::rounded<half::round_style, true>(arg.data_ - 3, 0, 1));
4658  std::pair<detail::uint32, detail::uint32> mm =
4659  detail::hyperbolic_args(abs, exp, 27);
4660  detail::uint32 my = mm.first - mm.second -
4661  (half::round_style != std::round_to_nearest),
4662  mx = mm.first + mm.second, i = (~mx & 0xFFFFFFFF) >> 31;
4663  for (exp = 13; my < 0x80000000; my <<= 1, --exp)
4664  ;
4665  mx = (mx >> i) | 0x80000000;
4666  return half(detail::binary, detail::tangent_post<half::round_style>(
4667  my, mx, exp - i, arg.data_ & 0x8000));
4668 #endif
4669 }

4744  return half(detail::binary,

4749  if (!abs)
4750  return arg;
4751  if (abs >= 0x3C00)
4752  return half(detail::binary, (abs == 0x3C00)
4753  ? detail::pole(arg.data_ & 0x8000)
4754  : (abs <= 0x7C00) ? detail::invalid()
4755  : detail::signal(arg.data_));

4877 inline half tgamma(half arg) {

4885  return half(detail::binary, detail::pole(arg.data_));
4886  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
4887  return (arg.data_ == 0x7C00)
4888  ? arg
4889  : half(detail::binary, detail::signal(arg.data_));

4891  (arg.data_ >= 0xBC00 && !(abs & ((1 << (25 - (abs >> 10))) - 1))))

4898  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>());
4899  if (arg.data_ == 0x3C00)
4900  return arg;
4901  return half(detail::binary,
4902  detail::gamma<half::round_style, false>(arg.data_));

5030 inline half frexp(half arg, int *exp) {
5031  *exp = 0;
5032  unsigned int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF;
5033  if (abs >= 0x7C00 || !abs)
5034  return (abs > 0x7C00) ? half(detail::binary, detail::signal(arg.data_))
5035  : arg;
5036  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, --*exp)
5037  ;
5038  *exp += (abs >> 10) - 14;
5039  return half(detail::binary, (arg.data_ & 0x8000) | 0x3800 | (abs & 0x3FF));
5040 }

5052 inline half scalbln(half arg, long exp) {
5053  unsigned int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, sign = arg.data_ & 0x8000;
5054  if (abs >= 0x7C00 || !abs)
5055  return (abs > 0x7C00) ? half(detail::binary, detail::signal(arg.data_))
5056  : arg;
5057  for (; abs < 0x400; abs <<= 1, --exp)
5058  ;
5059  exp += abs >> 10;
5060  if (exp > 30)
5061  return half(detail::binary, detail::overflow<half::round_style>(sign));
5062  else if (exp < -10)
5063  return half(detail::binary, detail::underflow<half::round_style>(sign));
5064  else if (exp > 0)
5065  return half(detail::binary, sign | (exp << 10) | (abs & 0x3FF));
5066  unsigned int m = (abs & 0x3FF) | 0x400;
5067  return half(detail::binary, detail::rounded<half::round_style, false>(
5068  sign | (m >> (1 - exp)), (m >> -exp) & 1,
5069  (m & ((1 << -exp) - 1)) != 0));
5070 }

5097 inline half modf(half arg, half *iptr) {
5098  unsigned int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF;
5099  if (abs > 0x7C00) {
5100  arg = half(detail::binary, detail::signal(arg.data_));
5101  return *iptr = arg, arg;
5102  }
5103  if (abs >= 0x6400)
5104  return *iptr = arg, half(detail::binary, arg.data_ & 0x8000);
5105  if (abs < 0x3C00)
5106  return iptr->data_ = arg.data_ & 0x8000, arg;
5107  unsigned int exp = abs >> 10, mask = (1 << (25 - exp)) - 1,
5108  m = arg.data_ & mask;
5109  iptr->data_ = arg.data_ & ~mask;
5110  if (!m)
5111  return half(detail::binary, arg.data_ & 0x8000);
5112  for (; m < 0x400; m <<= 1, --exp)
5113  ;
5114  return half(detail::binary, (arg.data_ & 0x8000) | (exp << 10) | (m & 0x3FF));
5115 }
5116 
5123 inline int ilogb(half arg) {
5124  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp;
5125  if (!abs || abs >= 0x7C00) {
5126  detail::raise(FE_INVALID);
5127  return !abs ? FP_ILOGB0 : (abs == 0x7C00) ? INT_MAX : FP_ILOGBNAN;
5128  }
5129  for (exp = (abs >> 10) - 15; abs < 0x200; abs <<= 1, --exp)
5130  ;
5131  return exp;
5132 }
5133 
5139 inline half logb(half arg) {
5140  int abs = arg.data_ & 0x7FFF, exp;
5141  if (!abs)
5142  return half(detail::binary, detail::pole(0x8000));
5143  if (abs >= 0x7C00)
5144  return half(detail::binary,
5145  (abs == 0x7C00) ? 0x7C00 : detail::signal(arg.data_));
5146  for (exp = (abs >> 10) - 15; abs < 0x200; abs <<= 1, --exp)
5147  ;
5148  unsigned int value = static_cast<unsigned>(exp < 0) << 15;
5149  if (exp) {
5150  unsigned int m = std::abs(exp) << 6;
5151  for (exp = 18; m < 0x400; m <<= 1, --exp)
5152  ;
5153  value |= (exp << 10) + m;
5154  }
5155  return half(detail::binary, value);
5156 }
5157 
5167 inline half nextafter(half from, half to) {
5168  int fabs = from.data_ & 0x7FFF, tabs = to.data_ & 0x7FFF;
5169  if (fabs > 0x7C00 || tabs > 0x7C00)
5170  return half(detail::binary, detail::signal(from.data_, to.data_));
5171  if (from.data_ == to.data_ || !(fabs | tabs))
5172  return to;
5173  if (!fabs) {
5174  detail::raise(FE_UNDERFLOW, !HALF_ERRHANDLING_UNDERFLOW_TO_INEXACT);
5175  return half(detail::binary, (to.data_ & 0x8000) + 1);
5176  }
5177  unsigned int out =
5178  from.data_ +
5179  (((from.data_ >> 15) ^
5180  static_cast<unsigned>(
5181  (from.data_ ^ (0x8000 | (0x8000 - (from.data_ >> 15)))) <
5182  (to.data_ ^ (0x8000 | (0x8000 - (to.data_ >> 15))))))
5183  << 1) -
5184  1;
5185  detail::raise(FE_OVERFLOW, fabs < 0x7C00 && (out & 0x7C00) == 0x7C00);
5186  detail::raise(FE_UNDERFLOW, !HALF_ERRHANDLING_UNDERFLOW_TO_INEXACT &&
5187  (out & 0x7C00) < 0x400);
5188  return half(detail::binary, out);
5189 }
5190 
5200 inline half nexttoward(half from, long double to) {
5201  int fabs = from.data_ & 0x7FFF;
5202  if (fabs > 0x7C00)
5203  return half(detail::binary, detail::signal(from.data_));
5204  long double lfrom = static_cast<long double>(from);
5205  if (detail::builtin_isnan(to) || lfrom == to)
5206  return half(static_cast<float>(to));
5207  if (!fabs) {
5208  detail::raise(FE_UNDERFLOW, !HALF_ERRHANDLING_UNDERFLOW_TO_INEXACT);
5209  return half(detail::binary,
5210  (static_cast<unsigned>(detail::builtin_signbit(to)) << 15) + 1);
5211  }
5212  unsigned int out =
5213  from.data_ +
5214  (((from.data_ >> 15) ^ static_cast<unsigned>(lfrom < to)) << 1) - 1;
5215  detail::raise(FE_OVERFLOW, (out & 0x7FFF) == 0x7C00);
5216  detail::raise(FE_UNDERFLOW, !HALF_ERRHANDLING_UNDERFLOW_TO_INEXACT &&
5217  (out & 0x7FFF) < 0x400);
5218  return half(detail::binary, out);
5219 }

5227 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR half copysign(half x, half y) {
5228  return half(detail::binary, x.data_ ^ ((x.data_ ^ y.data_) & 0x8000));
5229 }

5245 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR int fpclassify(half arg) {
5246  return !(arg.data_ & 0x7FFF) ? FP_ZERO
5247  : ((arg.data_ & 0x7FFF) < 0x400) ? FP_SUBNORMAL
5248  : ((arg.data_ & 0x7FFF) < 0x7C00) ? FP_NORMAL
5249  : ((arg.data_ & 0x7FFF) == 0x7C00) ? FP_INFINITE
5250  : FP_NAN;
5251 }

5312 inline HALF_CONSTEXPR bool isgreater(half x, half y) {

5314  ((y.data_ ^ (0x8000 | (0x8000 - (y.data_ >> 15)))) +
5315  (y.data_ >> 15)) &&
5316  !isnan(x) && !isnan(y);
5317 }

5326  (x.data_ >> 15)) >=
5327  ((y.data_ ^ (0x8000 | (0x8000 - (y.data_ >> 15)))) +

5521 inline void fethrowexcept(int excepts, const char *msg = "") {
5522  excepts &= detail::errflags();
5523  if (excepts & (FE_INVALID | FE_DIVBYZERO))
5524  throw std::domain_error(msg);
5525  if (excepts & FE_OVERFLOW)
5526  throw std::overflow_error(msg);
5527  if (excepts & FE_UNDERFLOW)
5528  throw std::underflow_error(msg);
5529  if (excepts & FE_INEXACT)
5530  throw std::range_error(msg);
5531 }
